response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product, valued at $15,000 to you, is a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled performance and efficiency. Given its high value and unique benefits, I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value, making it an exceptional opportunity for you to acquire such a valuable asset. I believe this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing substantial returns on your investment. Let's discuss how we can make this happen.", "product_price": 12000}
